message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses a machine learning approach for safe learning, specifically Learning from Interventions (LfI) via Behavior Cloning (BC) using a hierarchical policy framework. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of sub-goals and hierarchical policies also suggests relevance to robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper's focus on visual perception and manipulation tasks suggests potential relevance to computer vision (cs.CV).
